title: Here are all the best early Black Friday deals we can find right now [Updated]
content:
Update (11/22/21 12:50 pm EST): We've updated our roundup to make sure the deals below are still accurate. We've also added a few offers of note, including solid discounts on Apple's AirPods Pro, Razer's Kishi smartphone game controllers, a 512GB Samsung microSD card we like, and a recommended indoor security camera from Eufy, among others.

Black Friday has become more and more of a misnomer. As we noted when we first started seeing "early Black Friday" sales pop up earlier this month, what started out as a weekend of sales to help people get ahead of their holiday shopping has turned into a weeks-long barrage of breathless promotions.

Nevertheless, with the actual Black Friday arriving this week, various retailers appear to have set many of their Black Friday deals live in earnest. Target,Â Best Buy, and many more have started explicitly advertising their sales as such, with Amazon and others price-matching many of the better offers.
